refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Implementation of second-order high-pass Butterworth filter. This opcode can also be written as buthp.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: iskip (optional, default=0) -- Skip initialization if present and non-zero.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: These filters are Butterworth second-order IIR filters. They are slightly slower than the original filters in Csound, but they offer an almost flat passband and very good precision and stopband attenuation.
asig -- Input signal to be filtered.
kfreq/afreq -- Cutoff or center frequency for each of the filters.
